Manx: O Uss hur baase son cloan sheelnaue,
English: O Thou who suffered death for the children of mankind,
Diplomatic: O Uss hur baase son Chloan shelnaue

Manx: Dy voddagh shin ve mayrt ayns Niau,
English: So that we may be with Thee in Heaven,
Diplomatic: Dy voddagh shin ve mayrt ayns Niau

Manx: As er y chrosh gheayrt fuill Dty chree,
English: And on the cross the blood of Thy heart was shed,
Diplomatic: As er y chrosh gheart fuill dy chree

Manx: Son dy chordail yn seihll rish Jee.
English: To reconcile the world to God.
Diplomatic: Son dy coardaill yn seihll rish Jee

Manx: Nagh vel ayd nish dy chooilley phooar,
English: Do Thy not have now every power,
Diplomatic: Nagh vell ayd nish dy chooilley phooar

Manx: Ayns Niau erskyn as er yn ooir,
English: In Heaven above and upon the Earth,
Diplomatic: Ayns Niau erskin as er yn ooir

Manx: Nagh jean mee nish y yiooldey voyd,
English: Do not reject me now,
Diplomatic: Nagh jean mee nish y yooldey vooyd

Manx: Agh ayns dy vighyn gow mee hood.
English: But in Thy mercy, take me to Thee.
Diplomatic: Agh ayns dy vighyn gow mee hood

Manx: My pheccaghyn ta ard er n’aase,
English: My sins are that have grown high,
Diplomatic: My peccaghyn ta ard er naase

Manx: As nish ny lhie fo deyrey baase,
English: And now lie under sentence of death,
Diplomatic: As nish ny lhie fo dearey baase

Manx: Gys nee Uss cummey y ghoaill jee’m,
English: Until Thou takest take the form from me,
Diplomatic: Gys nee Uss chummey y ghoaill jee’m

Manx: As goaill mee seose dy ve lhiat hene.
English: And take me up to be with Thee.
Diplomatic: Ass ghoaill mee seose dy ve lhat hene

Manx: O cur Dty Spyrryd bannit dooys,
English: O give Thy Blessed Spirit to me,
Diplomatic: O chur dy Spyrryd bannyt dooys

Manx: Dy voddym shaghney Dty ymmoose,
English: That I may avoid Thy wrath,
Diplomatic: Dy voddym shaghney dy yemmoose

Manx: Dy voddym prayal as gleck as streeu,
English: That I may pray and struggle and strive,
Diplomatic: Dy voddym preeal as gleck as striew

Manx: As çhionney er gys irjey yn clieau.
English: And hasten on to the height of the mountain.
Diplomatic: As chonney er gys irjey n chlieu

Manx: Nish O my Hiarn bee dou çhymmoil
English: Now, O my Lord be compassionate for me,
Diplomatic: Nish O my Hiarn be dow chemmooil

Manx: As gow ersooyl dagh nhee peccoil,
English: And take away every sinful thing,
Diplomatic: As ghow ersooyl dagh nhee peccoill

Manx: As seal mee lesh Dty Spyrryd mie,
English: And seal me with Thy good Spirit,
Diplomatic: As seal mee lesh dy Spyrryd mie

Manx: Gys ver Oo lesh my annym thie.
English: Until you bring my soul home.
Diplomatic: Gys ver Oo lesh my annym thie

Manx: O Yeesey saue mee liorish grayse,
English: O Jesus save me by grace,
Diplomatic: O Yeesey saue mee liorish graase

Manx: Ren son my annym surranse baase,
English: Who suffered, for my soul, death,
Diplomatic: Ren son my annym surrans baase

Manx: Nish ayns Dty uill jean mish y nhiee,
English: Now, in Thy blood, wash me,
Diplomatic: Nish ayns dy uill jean mish y nhiee

Manx: As gow dagh olkys ass my chree.
English: And take every badness from my heart.
Diplomatic: As ghow dagh olkys ass my chree

Manx: O jean mee aarloo Hiarn ayns shoh,
English: O make me ready, Lord here,
Diplomatic: O jean me aarloo Hiarn ayns shoh

Manx: Son yn vea veayn choud’s ta mee bio,
English: For the eternal life, whilst I am alive,
Diplomatic: Son yn vea veean chouds ta mee bio

Manx: Nish skeayl yn ghraih ayd ayns my chree,
English: Now spread Thy love in my heart,
Diplomatic: Nish skeeayl yn ghraih ayd ayns my chree

Manx: As jean mee nish my vac dy Yee.
English: And make mee now a son of God.
Diplomatic: As jean mee nish my vac dy Yee

Manx: Scruit yn çhiaghtoo laa yeig jeh’n cheid vee jeh’n yeurey ayns yn vlein nuy cheead yieg.
English: Written on the seventeenth day of November in the year nineteen hundred.
Diplomatic: Scrieut yn shiaghtoo laa yeig jeh’n ched vee jeh’n geurey ayns yn vlein nee cheead yieg

Manx: Edward Faragher ayns Crenaish
English: Edward Faragher in Cregneash.
Diplomatic: Edward Faragher ayns Crenaish
